Posts.Content: Jun 21, 2009 01:58PM noni1 wrote: Smile,  Give it a chance.  When did you finish chemo.  It will start to  come back fuzzy,  but soon fills in and just keeps coming.  Don't give up.  I will pray for you. Cindy
Posts.Title: Hair Hair Hair - Another question Deen Krose53

Posts.Content: Jun 21, 2009 01:55PM noni1 wrote: Hi Deen, Your hair will come.  I had my last chemo end of September 08 and it is coming back very rapidly and it is curly.  Had poker straight hair.  I can not believe it.  But, once it starts it comes.  So does the shaving the legs and pits , the plucking eyebrows, and chin hairs,  but I love it, I am alive again.  Good luck to you !!!!!!! Cindy
Posts.Title: Hair Hair Hair - Another question Deen Krose53

Posts.Content: Jun 16, 2009 07:56AM noni1 wrote: The same thing happened to me. I kept my fingernails very short and I kept them.  I lost both of my big toe nails however.  They have almost grown completely back.  I just found this website, it is good to find women who are experiencing the same sx's and problems.  God Bless you all and keep up the fight.
